posts.title: Q&A with Photographer Ner Beck
posts.text: Learn more about this local artist and world traveler, who's been presenting solo shows across NYC libraries over the past nine years, and is currently exhibiting "Snow, Smiles & Seville" at the St. Agnes Library.

posts.title: Interview with Artist Bobbi Beck
posts.text: Meet this longtime Upper West Sider and frequent NYPL exhibitor, currently displaying her "Art Explorations" show at St. Agnes Library.

posts.title: Q&A with Visual Artist May Meng
posts.text: The artist-photographer shared her thoughts on her current photography exhibition, now at St. Agnes Library through October 27.
